remarks:
Epsilon irreflexivity of ordinals: no ordinal class is a member of itself.  Theorem 2.2(i) of [BellMachover] p. 469, generalized to classes. We prove this without invoking the Axiom of Regularity.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-1994.) 

---

 Epsilon irreflexivity of ordinals: no ordinal class is a member of itself.  Theorem 2.2(i) of [BellMachover] p. 469, generalized to classes. (Contributed by NM, 2-Jan-1994.)
statement: ordirr $p |- ( Ord A -> -. A e. A ) $.
